challenges.description:
Lingokids is a online language learning service for children ages 2-6. Backed by top VC investors like Bessemer, Holtbrinck Ventures or JME.

Launched from scratch a new product designed for educators. Responsibilities:

- Product: identify educators' problems and build a product to solve them
- Marketing: execute a marketing strategy using different channels finding an attractive cost of acquisition
- Management: coordinate with tech, marketing and content departments for different tasks
- Business development: close long-term collaborations with several stakeholders

European seed VC fund investing in marketplaces and digital vertical brands. Responsibilities:

- End to end analysis of investment opportunities: discovery, analysis and negotiation
- Content marketing: newsletter and blog posts
- Foster relationship with ecosystem: Business Angels, Accelerators, VCs, etc.
- Market analysis and pattern discovery

Mobile app that allows you to purchase lottery tickets and place group bets in an easy, safe and transparent way (best Spanish social-gaming company and newcomer in digital gambling in 2017). Responsibilities:

- Management: hiring and leading a team of 7 people from top companies and universities
- Finance: +300.000 € raised and +200.000 € in sales
- Product: customer development, design and product definition
- Analytics: developed an in-house analytics model using Python and different SaaS that
allowed to track deeply and easily every metric of the company

Strategy & operations consulting. Projects description:

- Takeover of a real estate servicer after its purchase by a private equity fund.
- PMO (Project Management Office) in real estate asset valuation due diligence for a Spanish financial institution.
- Online marketing strategy review and automated scorecard creation for an online learning institution.
- New product definition, development and commercialization for a multinational telecommunication corporation.
- End-to-end customer experience review for a multinational telecommunication corporation.
- Redefinition of the pricing strategy for a multinational telecommunication corporation.
- Development of the funding seeking strategy for a cutting-edge health research project. Working for a non-profit organization and a research institute.
- Assessment of alternative energy storage markets worldwide. New technology development and market entry. Working for a top Spanish company in the energy sector.

Business Consulting. Projects description:

- Middle/back-office process re-engineering for a multinational Spanish bank.
- Banking social media strategy.
